alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 05 at 2:41PM MST until March 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, and Huerfano and Western Las Animas Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages will be possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north south oriented roads. Areas of blowing dust could reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
